# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a widget bundle using the bundle’s body as its content.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency init()
```

## Running a widget bundle

- **main()**: Initializes and runs the widget bundle.

items.description: Initializes and runs the widget bundle.
